body.p: A custom framework (document type) can be created using a special XML descriptor file, either from scratch or by extending an existing built-in framework (such as DITA or DocBook) and then making modifications to it.
The Compile Framework Script script helps you compile the script into the *.framework file that represents the framework configuration.

section.title: Arguments for the Compile Framework Script

dlentry.dd: A list of space-separated Framework Extension Script Files (*.exf) or directories in file syntax form. If a directory is specified, the Framework Extension Script Files files are searched for inside it and in its child directories.
